name: Rolling Titans
description:
Rolling Titans is a twin stick shooter, centred around large hunks of metal blowing the bolts out of each other!

Open fire on your enemy, using cover and strategically placed mines to get the upper hand!

This prototype includes a simple multiplayer only 1v1 mode.

Two Xbox 360 or Xbox One controllers are required.

This game was made over a weekend for fun, but if there is enough interest in it I will keep working on it. I plan to include various other items and powerups, as well as co-operative levels involving AI controlled tanks. 

Feel free to message with any feedback or questions! 

Dev Notes:

Keyboard controls are available for one player testing if you would just like to get a rough feel for the movement and shooting. 

WSAD moves, arrow keys aim, Space to shoot and Alt to drop mines. 

Everything except sounds were made by myself using Maya, Substance Painter, Photoshop. 

Created in Unreal Engine 4 entirely using the blueprint system. 

Sounds bought from the unreal marketplace.
